channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Assembleia da República

item.title: Opinion Poll by CESOP–UCP for Público and RTP, 24 January 2021 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata: 62–69 seats
  • Partido Socialista: 102–109 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda: 14–18 seats
  • CDS–Partido Popular: 0–1 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária: 8–14 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza: 1–2 seats
  • LIVRE: 0–1 seats
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 12–14 seats
  • Chega: 14–20 seats
